intro-hello.content: A city can be just as wild as the country, with nature all around!

intro-lookforsigns.content: Look for signs of animals, plants, water, and weather.
Tap what you find to discover nature in the city!

tutorial-tapmove.content: Tap the sides of the screen to move around.

tutorial-glow.content: Look! Here’s something new to do!

tutorial-earnseeds.content: You earned a seed! Later, you’ll get to plant it!

garden-comebacklater.content: Explore the city to earn seeds that you can plant in this rooftop garden.

garden-waterseeds.content: Water your seeds so they can sprout.

garden-checklater.content: Your plants need more time to grow.

garden-citybutton.content: When you’re done, tap the city button to explore more.

garden-moreseeds.content: You have more seeds. Be sure to plant and water them!

garden-foodforinsects.content: Some flowers, like dahlias, irises, or cosmos, are food for insects.

garden-foodforanimalshumans.content: Sunflowers have food for animals and humans.

garden-foodforhumans.content: Chives and parsley leaves are food for humans.

garden-newgarden.content: You can tap to plant in another garden.

garden-feedback-timetogrow.content: If your plants haven’t grown yet, remember, they need time to grow.

garden-feedback-explorecity.content: Explore the city more to earn new seeds.

garden-remindnewgarden.content: This garden is full. Tap to go to a new garden.

mission-tapformission.content: Tap here to get a mission from me!

mission-findwildlifeday.content: Good morning, explorer! What wildlife can you find today?

mission-findwildlifenight.content: Good evening, explorer! What wildlife can you find at night?

mission-newatnight.content: It’s nighttime. Do you notice anything that’s different than it was during the day?

mission-findgarden.content: You can visit your rooftop garden any time!

mission-tapclouds.content: Rain gives plants and animals the water they need to live and grow.
What do you think will happen when you tap the clouds?

mission-findnests.content: Some animals make nests to keep their eggs or babies safe.
Can you find different animals making their nests?

mission-homenearwater.content: Animals make their homes in places where they have what they need to live.
Can you find an animal that makes its home near water?

mission-threebirds.content: Can you find three different kinds of birds?

mission-tinyanimals.content: What’s the tiniest animal you can find?
Look near rocks and leaves that might protect them from bigger animals.

mission-watertodrink.content: All animals need water to live and grow.
How many places can you find for animals to get a drink of water?

mission-awakeatnight.content: How many animals can you find that are awake at night?

mission-whoeatsseeds.content: How many animals can you find that eat seeds?

mission-whoeatsworms.content: Can you find two animals that eat insects or worms?

mission-spiderweb.content: Can you find where a spider catches food?

mission-citytrees.content: How does a city tree help animals?
What kind of food and shelter do they provide?

mission-unusualplantplaces.content: Plants can live anywhere there is water, air, light, and nutrients.
Can you find plants living in unusual places?

mission-beesbutterflies.content: Bees and butterflies get pollen from flowers.
They bring the pollen to other flowers, which makes seeds.
Can you find any bees or butterflies in the city?

mission-findseeds.content: Can you find seeds that have fallen from flowers or trees?
Animals in the city might eat them!

mission-sunnyplaces.content: Can you find sunny places where plants are growing?

mission-shadyspot.content: City buildings and trees can provide cool, shade on a hot day.
Can you find any animals spending time in a shady spot?

mission-findpuddles.content: Sometimes rainwater sinks into the ground,
and sometimes it pools and forms puddles.
Can you find two places where rainwater makes puddles?

mission-changesafterrain.content: Can you find anything that changes after it rains?

mission-cleanuptrash.content: Wind and animals can spread trash around.
Can you help clean it up?

mission-streetlightson.content: Some animals are attracted to light.
Try turning the streetlights on to see what happens!

mission-findmorenature.content: You’re finding lots of nature in the city!

mission-findmorewildlife.content: There’s so much wildlife living in the city!

mission-tapanimalsplants.content: Tap the animals and plants you find to see how they live.

mission-links-whoeatsacorns.content: The acorns blew down onto the ground.
Tap an animal that might eat them for food.

mission-links-whoeatsmaple.content: The maple seeds blew down onto the ground. Can you find an animal that might eat them?

mission-links-findworms.content: Worms come out of the dirt after it rains.
Use this information to help you find the worms.

mission-links-whoeatsworms.content: Which animal might eat a worm?

mission-links-rainagain.content: Can you make it rain again?

mission-links-buildpigeonnest.content: The pigeon is building a safe place to lay its eggs.

mission-links-hatchpigeoneggs.content: I wonder if the pigeon laid eggs? Let's check its nest!

active-acorncollection.content: What happens if you tap the tree branch a few times?

active-eatsacorn-squirrel.content: Can you show the squirrel where the acorns are?

active-eatsacorn-rat.content: Can you show the rat where the acorns are?

inactive-awaitsacorns-squirrel.content: Can you find food for the squirrel to eat?

inactive-awaitsacorns-rat.content: Can you find food for the rat to eat?

active-eatsseed-sparrow.content: Seeds fell from flowers growing near here!
Can you find some for this hungry sparrow to eat?

active-eatsseed-raccoon.content: Seeds fell from flowers growing near here!
Can you find some for this hungry raccoon to eat?

active-eatmaple-sparrow.content: Seeds fell from tress growing near here! Can you find some for this hungry sparrow to eat?

active-eatmaple-raccoon.content: Seeds fell from tress growing near here! Can you find some for this hungry raccoon to eat?

active-wormeats.content: Can you help this hungry worm eat the leaves?
Draw a path it can follow.

active-eatsworm-starling.content: The starling is looking for food.
Do you see anything it could eat?

active-eatsworm-raccoon.content: The raccoon is looking for food.
Do you see anything it could eat?

active-eatsworm-rat.content: The rat is looking for food. Do you see anything it could eat?

active-eatstrash-squirrel.content: Do you see any food that a squirrel might like to eat?

active-eatstrash-rat.content: Do you see any food that a rat might like to eat?

inactive-awaitstrash.content: Some city animals eat food people have thrown out.
See if you find any later!

active-lighton.content: Can you turn the light on?

inactive-awaitsnight-light.content: Try turning the streetlights on at night.

active-spidereats-moth.content: The spider is trying to catch a moth.

active-collectsticks.content: Can you help the pigeon find sticks for its nest?

inactive-collectsticks.content: The pigeon uses sticks like these to make its nest.
Come back during the day, when the pigeon is awake.

active-pigeonnest.content: Can you help the pigeon make a nest?

active-hatchpigeoneggs.content: The pigeon laid eggs - and now the chicks are ready to hatch!

active-ducknest.content: Can you help the duck make a nest?

inactive-ducknest.content: The duck is making its nest here.
Come back during the day, when it's awake.

active-rabbitnest.content: Can you help the rabbit make a nest for its babies?
Drag more materials to add them.

inactive-rabbitnest.content: The rabbit is making its nest here.
Come back during the day, when it's awake.

inactive-animalasleep-night.content: This animal is sleeping. Come back during the day.

active-flowers-butterflies.content: Where do you think this butterfly can find some?

active-flowers-bees.content: Bees eat pollen and drink nectar.
Where can this bee find some?

active-pollinatedandelion.content: Can you help the bee find some food?

inactive-pollinatedandelion.content: Come back during the day to find them.

active-puddle-sparrow.content: Tap the puddle a few times to help them find something to drink.

active-puddle-squirrel.content: Tap the puddle a few times to help it find something to drink.

active-puddle-raccoon.content: Tap the puddle a few times to help it find something to drink.

active-puddle-fox.content: Tap the puddle a few times to help it find something to drink.

active-puddle-rat.content: The rat is thirsty! Tap the puddle a few times to help it find something to drink.

active-cleanlitter.content: Can you put all this litter in the bins?

inactive-cleanlitter.content: All the trash is in the bins. Check again later to make sure the city stays clean.

active-eatsworm-fox.content: The fox is looking for food. Do you see anything it could eat?

active-eatstrash-fox.content: Do you see anything that a fox might like to eat?

active-mallardnest.content: Can you help the duck make a nest?
